amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to promoting the return of children who have been legally adopted from the Democratic Republic of the Congo and are only a plane ride away from becoming United States citizens to their American citizen parents residing in the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 950 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 950 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text: CR 3/26/2015 S2015) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to promoting the return of children who have been legally adopted from the Democratic Republic of the Congo and are only a plane ride away from becoming United States citizens to their American citizen parents residing in the United States.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 950 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 950 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator McConnell.
